prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon with striking yellow feathers and powerful wings that can soar through storms.
Imagine a legendary bird Pokemon with a fierce gaze, capable of summoning thunderstorms and flying at high speeds.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the power of lightning, featuring sharp talons and a vibrant color palette.
Design a mythical creature that has the ability to control the weather, with a majestic wingspan and electrifying aura.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a thunderbird, with vivid colors and a strong presence in the sky.
Make a legendary electric Pokemon that has both beauty and strength, soaring over mountains and forests.
Give me an image of a majestic, powerful bird Pokemon that commands the skies with its electric abilities.
